s: June 22, 2023 - In terms of things you shouldn’t put into the FoodCycler, you’ll want to avoid anything hard, such as fruit pits, bones, nuts, and even gum or candy. The brand also recommends including a mixture of different foods in each cycler, avoiding high concentrations of a single food.
